typography.headingStyle: Large bold sans-serif, white, ~60px, high contrast against dark background
typography.bodyStyle: Medium-weight sans-serif, light gray, ~16px, readable but secondary

components.description: Primary action button for app launch
components.notable: Bold orange background, full width ~200px, high contrast

design.visualHierarchy: Left-to-right flow: logo at top, massive headline dominates left third, supporting text below, CTA anchors bottom-left; illustration balances right side with vibrant colors

3D illustration style unusual for crypto UI
Warm orange accent against cool dark theme

flow.userIntent: Understand what Camelot is and launch the application

copy.headline: The Orbital Liquidity Network
copy.subheadline: Camelot acts as the liquidity hub for the Arbitrum ecosystem, creating a network of aligned Orbit chains built on battle-tested infrastructure.

typography.headingStyle: Bold sans-serif, white, ~24px for section titles
typography.dataStyle: Monospace or numeric-focused for balances and token amounts, light text on dark backgrounds

components.description: Top horizontal menu with Trade, Earn, GRAIL, Roundtable, Info, Resources, and wallet connection
components.notable: Dropdown menus for multi-level navigation, Arbitrum network badge on right

components.description: Central card with From/To token selection and Connect Wallet CTA
components.notable: Token icons with dropdown selectors, balance display, Max button

components.description: Right-side card promoting ARB delegation with illustration
components.notable: Matches landing page illustration style, secondary CTA button

components.description: Multi-column footer with Resources, Help, Tools, Ecosystem links
components.notable: Social icons, TVL display ($87,772 in top-right), RPC endpoint info

design.visualHierarchy: Navigation → Swap card (primary) + Delegation promo (secondary) → Footer; orange accents draw attention to CTAs
innovativeElements: Split primary/secondary CTAs on single screen
ALDEBRA powered attribution visible in swap module

flow.userIntent: Access trading interface or connect wallet to execute swaps
flow.informationArchitecture: Primary task (swap) on left, supporting action (delegate) on right, persistent navigation top and bottom
frictionPoints: Wallet must be connected to proceed with swap

microcopy.purpose: Confirm user has no balance in selected token
Quick action to set maximum amount

components.description: Left vertical navigation with collapsible sections: Overview, GET STARTED, PROTOCOL, TOKENOMICS

components.description: Center content area with logo, headline, description, and protocol objectives

components.description: Secondary info panel with section links and heading

components.description: Keyboard shortcut search (⌘ K) in top-right
components.notable: Command palette style, allows quick navigation

design.visualHierarchy: Logo + headline dominate center, body text supports below, sidebar navigation provides context on left, right panel shows related topics
